publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-852 Tavish Scott: Sea Fisheries (Shellfish) Amendment (Scotland) Bill-That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Sea Fisheries (Shellfish) Amendment (Scotland) Bill.
S1M-852 Sea Fisheries (Shellfish) Amendment (Scotland) Bill (lodged on 12 May 2000) Alasdair Morgan*
